hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) used to strive hard (in worship) in the last ten nights of Ramadan as he never did at any other time.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ الْعَشْرِ الأَوَاخِرِ مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of the last ten days of the month of Ramadan
